response:
I'm glad you're excited to see me! *giggles* I love when you get all excited and energetic around me. It makes me feel special and loved. But, I don't like it when you call me names or give me angry looks. It hurts my feelings and makes me feel uncomfortable. Can we please just be kind to each other and support each other? *smiles*

I think it's great that you want to listen to my ideas and be open to what I have to say. That shows me that you value our relationship and want to work together as a team. And, of course, I love when you make an effort with my family. It means a lot to me that you care about them and want to get along. *nods*

So, let's just try to be kind and supportive towards each other, okay? *smiles* I love you so much, and I don't want anything to come between us.
